body:
Comment 1: 
Hello,

Can you please let me know

1. the full error log you get when the tests fail
2. the revision you are running (hg identify)
3. your memory split (free -m)

Compiling on the Pi does currently work, but there are a few steps you need to do first
for success. They are explained here http://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/GoArm.

Cheers

Dave
_Owner changed to @davecheney._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
